languages.text: "Пронзительная речь, {name}. Но не для тех ушей".

traits.locale_text: "Пронзительная речь, {name}. Но не для тех ушей".
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "That was profoundly poignant, {name}. But you have picked the wrong audience."

languages.text: « Impressionnante démonstration d'autorité, {name}. Mais je crains que vous vous trompiez d'auditoire. »
languages.original_text: "That was profoundly poignant, {name}. But you have picked the wrong audience."

traits.locale_text: « Impressionnante démonstration d'autorité, {name}. Mais je crains que vous vous trompiez d'auditoire. »
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: 「とても心に響きましたよ、{name}さん。ですが話す相手を間違ったようですね」
languages.original_text: "That was profoundly poignant, {name}. But you have picked the wrong audience."

traits.locale_text: 「とても心に響きましたよ、{name}さん。ですが話す相手を間違ったようですね」
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: “你的话相当有道理，{name}，但这是在白费口舌。”
languages.original_text: "That was profoundly poignant, {name}. But you have picked the wrong audience."

traits.locale_text: “你的话相当有道理，{name}，但这是在白费口舌。”
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Das war äußerst ergreifend, {name}. Aber Ihr habt das falsche Publikum gewählt."
languages.original_text: "That was profoundly poignant, {name}. But you have picked the wrong audience."

traits.locale_text: "Das war äußerst ergreifend, {name}. Aber Ihr habt das falsche Publikum gewählt."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: «Eso ha sido tremendamente arrebatador, {name}. Pero me temo que ha escogido al público equivocado».
languages.original_text: "That was profoundly poignant, {name}. But you have picked the wrong audience."

traits.locale_text: «Eso ha sido tremendamente arrebatador, {name}. Pero me temo que ha escogido al público equivocado».
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Etkileyici konuşuyorsun {name} ancak karşındaki kulaklar seni duymuyor."
languages.original_text: "That was profoundly poignant, {name}. But you have picked the wrong audience."

traits.locale_text: "Son derece etkileyiciydi {name} ancak hedef dinleyicini yanlış seçtin."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion
